scripts.dotnet:generate:old: npm install && cd dotNet && coverage-tests create-tests --path . --coverage-tests-local-path ../tests.js && mv ./test/Selenium/coverage/generic/Appium_*.cs ./test/Appium/coverage/generic
scripts.dotnet:generate: npm install && cd dotNet && coverage-tests generate --configPath . && mv ./test/Selenium/coverage/generic/*Native*.cs ./test/Appium/coverage/generic
scripts.dotnet:generate:win0: npm install && cd dotNet && coverage-tests generate --configPath . && move /Y .\test\Selenium\coverage\generic\*Native*.cs .\test\Appium\coverage\generic
scripts.dotnet:generate:win: npm install && cd dotNet && coverage-tests create-tests --path . --coverage-tests-local-path ../tests.js && move /Y .\test\Selenium\coverage\generic\Appium_*.cs .\test\Appium\coverage\generic
scripts.dotnet:generate:win2: npm install && cd dotNet && coverage-tests generate --configPath . && move /Y .\test\Selenium\coverage\generic\Appium_*.cs .\test\Appium\coverage\generic
scripts.dotnet:generate:win3: npm install && cd dotNet && coverage-tests generate --configPath .
scripts.dotnet:generate:win4: cd dotNet && coverage-tests generate --configPath . --emitOnly "/^check hovered region by element/"
scripts.dotnet:generate:win5: cd dotNet && coverage-tests generate --configPath . --emitOnly "should fail check of stale element"
scripts.dotnet:generate:win52: npm install && cd dotNet && coverage-tests generate --configPath . --emitOnly "/^should fail check of stale element/"
scripts.dotnet:generate:win6: cd dotNet && coverage-tests generate --configPath . --emitOnly "/^should send ignore region by coordinates with css stitching/"
scripts.dotnet:report: [ "$TEST_REPORT_SANDBOX" = "False" ] && npm run dotnet:report:prod || npm run dotnet:report:sandbox
